  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RECIEVED A CALL FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON ARRIVAL IDENTIFIED THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND CONTAMINATED. DISCOVERED THAT THE LEAKING PACKAGE WAS A HAZMAT PACKAGE. PLACED HAZMAT AND CONTAMINATED IN SPILL TRAY. TRANSPORTED TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL

item.title: Report X-2025011097
item.description:
Report X-2025011097

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-18
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED ABOUT A LEAKING PACKAGE IN THE UNLOAD AND RESPONDED TO THE LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER VISABLY FOUND A STAINED LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE AND BROUGHT BACK TO THE PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON OPENING THE PACKAGE RESPONDER NOTICED THE CONTAINERS INSIDE WERE LEAKING AROUND THE CLOSURE.

item.title: Report E-2025010359
item.description:
Report E-2025010359

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-31
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0806 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal UPH. It was reported that approximately 2 quarts of Sika Primer 207 released from metal container due to forklift puncture. The release impacted trailer # 4633543 (2) cases are being held back. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. The terminal used a 35-gallon poly drum for the waste.

Report I-2025010074

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During unload 3 pallets of paints were stacked on top of each other. upon review one pail was found breached resulting in a spill. Spill was contained and placed in HM waste container to be tendered to a license HW hauler.
